languages.text: "Вот-вот! Терпите, ничтожества! Они вас не боятся!" {n}Голос Гнили в возникшей тишине звучит неуместно, чуждо, теряет силу. Весть о наказании вернула в умы рабочих толику понимания — мир таков, каков должен быть. За дерзостью последовало воздаяние. Мир — понятен и не страшен.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Вот-вот! Терпите, ничтожества! Они вас не боятся!" {n}Голос Гнили в возникшей тишине звучит неуместно, чуждо, теряет силу. Весть о наказании вернула в умы рабочих толику понимания — мир таков, каков должен быть. За дерзостью последовало воздаяние. Мир — понятен и не страшен.{/n}

languages.text: "That's right! Deal with it, you lowlifes! They are not afraid of you!" {n}Rot's voice seems out of place in the hanging silence, sounding foreign, bereft of power. The word of the punishment has returned a shred of reason to the minds of the workers, for all is as it should be. Insolence has been followed by retribution. The world makes sense once more, and is no longer frightening.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "That's right! Deal with it, you lowlifes! They are not afraid of you!" {n}Rot's voice seems out of place in the hanging silence, sounding foreign, bereft of power. The word of the punishment has returned a shred of reason to the minds of the workers, for all is as it should be. Insolence has been followed by retribution. The world makes sense once more, and is no longer frightening.{/n}

"That is right! Put up with it, you lowlifes! They are not afraid of you!" {n}Mildew's voice sounds out of place in the silence, chimes foreign, loses its power. The news of the punishment brought back a modicum of understanding into the minds of the workers, the world is as it should be. Insolence was followed by retribution. The world is understandable and no longer frightening.{/n}

The news of the punishment has returned a modicum of rationality to the minds of the workers, and all is as it should be. Insolence has been followed by retribution. The world makes sense once more, and is no longer frightening.{/n}

languages.text: "Ganz genau! Werdet damit fertig, Ihr Taugenichtse! Sie haben keine Angst vor Euch!" {n}Fäules Stimme scheint in der schweren Stille fehl am Platz zu sein, sie klingt fremd und machtlos. Die Erwähnung von Bestrafung hat den Arbeitern einen Hauch Vernunft zurückgebracht, denn alles ist, wie es sein sollte. Ihre Anmaßung hat zu Vergeltung geführt. Die Welt ergibt wieder Sinn und ist nicht länger furchteinflößend.{/n}
languages.original_text: "That's right! Deal with it, you lowlifes! They are not afraid of you!" {n}Rot's voice seems out of place in the hanging silence, sounding foreign, bereft of power. The word of the punishment has returned a shred of reason to the minds of the workers, for all is as it should be. Insolence has been followed by retribution. The world makes sense once more, and is no longer frightening.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ganz genau! Werdet damit fertig, Ihr Taugenichtse! Sie haben keine Angst vor Euch!" {n}Mehltaus Stimme scheint in der schweren Stille fehl am Platz zu sein, sie klingt fremd und machtlos. Die Erwähnung von Bestrafung hat den Arbeitern einen Hauch Vernunft zurückgebracht, denn alles ist, wie es sein sollte. Ihre Anmaßung hat zu Vergeltung geführt. Die Welt ergibt wieder Sinn und ist nicht länger furchteinflößend.{/n}

languages.text: «¡Eso es! ¡A sufrir, escoria! ¡No os tienen ningún miedo!». {n}La voz de Podredumbre parece fuera de lugar en el silencio, como ajena, carente de poder. La palabra del castigo ha devuelto un retazo de raciocinio a las mentes de los trabajadores, y todo es como debe ser. La insolencia ha encontrado su retribución. El mundo vuelve a tener sentido y ya no da miedo.{/n}
languages.original_text: "That's right! Deal with it, you lowlifes! They are not afraid of you!" {n}Rot's voice seems out of place in the hanging silence, sounding foreign, bereft of power. The word of the punishment has returned a shred of reason to the minds of the workers, for all is as it should be. Insolence has been followed by retribution. The world makes sense once more, and is no longer frightening.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡Eso es! ¡A sufrir, escoria! ¡No os tienen ningún miedo!». {n}La voz de Moho parece fuera de lugar en el silencio, como ajena, carente de poder. La palabra del castigo ha devuelto un retazo de raciocinio a las mentes de los trabajadores, y todo es como debe ser. La insolencia ha encontrado su retribución. El mundo vuelve a tener sentido y ya no da miedo.{/n}

languages.text: 「そうだ！お前らゲスがどうにかしろ！奴らはお前を恐れてはいない！」{n}ロットの声は漂う静寂の中で場違いに響き、異質で力強さを感じない。処罰という言葉で、労働者たちの心には一握りの理性が戻った。本来そうあるべきなのだ。不埒な行為には報復が待っている。世界は再び理性を取り戻し、恐ろしい雰囲気は消えていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "That's right! Deal with it, you lowlifes! They are not afraid of you!" {n}Rot's voice seems out of place in the hanging silence, sounding foreign, bereft of power. The word of the punishment has returned a shred of reason to the minds of the workers, for all is as it should be. Insolence has been followed by retribution. The world makes sense once more, and is no longer frightening.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「そうだ！お前らゲスがどうにかしろ！奴らはお前を恐れてはいない！」{n}カビの声は漂う静寂の中で場違いに響き、異質で力強さを感じない。処罰という言葉で、労働者たちの心には一握りの理性が戻った。本来そうあるべきなのだ。不埒な行為には報復が待っている。世界は再び理性を取り戻し、恐ろしい雰囲気は消えていた。{/n}

languages.text: “没错！面对现实吧，你们这些贱种！他们根本不怕你们！”{n}周围一片寂静。“脓疮”的声音听起来很陌生，与周围的一切格格不入，失去了力量。惩罚的话语让工人们的头脑恢复了部分理智。惩罚理当拥有如此成效，蛮横的恶行必将遭到惩处。这个世界再次有了意义，不再令人感到恐惧。{/n}
languages.original_text: "That's right! Deal with it, you lowlifes! They are not afraid of you!" {n}Rot's voice seems out of place in the hanging silence, sounding foreign, bereft of power. The word of the punishment has returned a shred of reason to the minds of the workers, for all is as it should be. Insolence has been followed by retribution. The world makes sense once more, and is no longer frightening.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “没错！面对现实吧，你们这些卑贱的家伙！他们根本不怕你们！”{n}周围一片寂静。“霉毯”的声音听起来很陌生，与周围的一切格格不入，失去了力量。惩罚的话语让工人们的头脑恢复了部分理智。惩罚理当拥有如此成效，蛮横的恶行必将遭到惩处。这个世界再次有了意义，不再令人感到恐惧。{/n}

languages.text: « Oui ! Voyez la réalité en face, misérables ! Ils n'ont pas peur de vous ! » {n}La voix de Pourriture semble déplacée dans le silence pesant, comme étrangère, vide de toute puissance. La rumeur de la punition a ramené un semblant de raison dans l'esprit des travailleurs, ainsi qu'il se doit. L'insolence a été suivie d'un châtiment. Le monde est à nouveau en ordre. Il ne les effraie plus.{/n}
languages.original_text: "That's right! Deal with it, you lowlifes! They are not afraid of you!" {n}Rot's voice seems out of place in the hanging silence, sounding foreign, bereft of power. The word of the punishment has returned a shred of reason to the minds of the workers, for all is as it should be. Insolence has been followed by retribution. The world makes sense once more, and is no longer frightening.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Oui ! Voyez la réalité en face, misérables ! Ils n'ont pas peur de vous ! » {n}La voix de Moisissure semble déplacée dans le silence pesant, comme étrangère, vide de toute puissance. La rumeur de la punition a ramené un semblant de raison dans l'esprit des travailleurs, ainsi qu'il se doit. L'insolence a été suivie d'un châtiment. Le monde est à nouveau en ordre. Il ne les effraie plus.{/n}

languages.text: "Doğru duydunuz! Gerçeği kabullenin sefiller! Sizden korkmuyorlar!" {n}Çürük'ün sesi, süregelen sessizlikte yersizce yankılanıyor. Kulağa güçten yoksun, yabancı bir ses gibi geliyor. Cezalandırma kelimesi, işçilerin zihnine bir nebze de olsa mantığı geri getiriyor. Tıpkı olması gerektiği gibi... Küstahlığın ardından intikam geliyor. Dünya, korkutmak yerine bir kez daha anlamlı geliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "That's right! Deal with it, you lowlifes! They are not afraid of you!" {n}Rot's voice seems out of place in the hanging silence, sounding foreign, bereft of power. The word of the punishment has returned a shred of reason to the minds of the workers, for all is as it should be. Insolence has been followed by retribution. The world makes sense once more, and is no longer frightening.{/n}
